features.name: Startblock Onboarding

User can receive personalized greetings and guidance during onboarding
User can ask questions and get responses about the codebase

features.name: Livekit Integration
userFlows: User can generate a LiveKit token for real-time communication
User can create or join a LiveKit room for onboarding sessions
User can generate a LiveKit token for video sessions
User can join a video room based on session ID
